```{r}
#install.packages("neonUtilities")
#install.packages("here")

library(tidyverse)
library(neonUtilities)
library(here)
```
```{r}
# Ground beetles sampled from pitfall traps
water_fishes <- "DP1.20107.001"

# Precipitation
water_macroinvertebrates <- "DP1.20120.001"

# Two selected focal sites
my_sites <- c("MAYF", "BIGC")

# Start date (as YYYY-MM)
start_date <- "2020-01"

# End date (as YYYY-MM)
end_date <- "2021-11"

```

```{r}

list2env((loadByProduct(dpID = water_fishes, 
                        site = my_sites, 
                        include.provisional = TRUE,
                        startdate = start_date,
                        enddate = end_date)),
         .GlobalEnv)

```

```{r}
variables_20107 %>% 
  write_csv(here("data", "raw", "variables_20107.csv"))

fsh_bulkCount %>% 
  write_csv(here("data", "raw", "fsh_bulkCount.csv"))
```
